title: How hot spots of genetic variation evolved in human DNA

title_detail.value: How hot spots of genetic variation evolved in human DNA

summary: New research investigates hot spots of genetic variation within the human genome, examining the sections of our DNA that are most likely to differ significantly from one person to another.

summary_detail.value: New research investigates hot spots of genetic variation within the human genome, examining the sections of our DNA that are most likely to differ significantly from one person to another.
